Package dev.todoapp.infrastructure

Class SpringBootApplicationStack

java.lang.Object
software.amazon.jsii.JsiiObject
software.constructs.Construct
software.amazon.awscdk.Stack
dev.todoapp.infrastructure.SpringBootApplicationStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
software.amazon.awscdk.ITaggable, software.amazon.jsii.JsiiSerializable, software.constructs.IConstruct, software.constructs.IDependable
public class SpringBootApplicationStack extends software.amazon.awscdk.Stack
This stack creates a Network and a Service that deploys a given Docker image. The Service is pre-configured for a Spring Boot application.

This construct is for demonstration purposes since it's not configurable and thus of little practical use.
